00216 inline bool CaloHitManager::IsCaloHitAvailable(CaloHit *const pCaloHit) const
00217 {
00218     if (0 == m_nReclusteringProcesses)
00219         return pCaloHit->m_isAvailable;
00220 
00221     return m_pCurrentReclusterMetadata->GetCurrentCaloHitMetadata()->IsCaloHitAvailable(pCaloHit);
00222 }
00223 
00224 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00225 
00226 inline StatusCode CaloHitManager::SetCaloHitAvailability(CaloHit *const pCaloHit, bool isAvailable)
00227 {
00228     if (0 == m_nReclusteringProcesses)
00229     {
00230         pCaloHit->m_isAvailable = isAvailable;
00231         return STATUS_CODE_SUCCESS;
00232     }
00233 
00234     return m_pCurrentReclusterMetadata->GetCurrentCaloHitMetadata()->SetCaloHitAvailability(pCaloHit, isAvailable);
00235 }
